title: Wrangell - St Elias National Park & Preserve: Photos & Drawings of Kennecott
body: Photos & Drawings of Kennecott        Inside the Kennecott Power Plant NPS   Â    Here are several photo galleries of Kennecott, including: Ethel LeCount Photo Album    Personal photos taken by a Kennecott Nurse (1937-38). Kennecott Engineering Drawings Documentation of Kennecott was undertaken by the Historic American Engineering Record (HAER), a division of the National Park Service, in cooperation with the Great Kennecott Glacier Land Company. Recording was carried out during the summers of 1985 and 1986.
